column1: #text=A few years ago we took a Mexican vacation .
#text=We heard the best way to travel is on the bus .
#text=We stood outside in the heat on the long sidewalk waiting for it .
#text=As we were standing there a giant gecko came out of the bushes .
#text=They say not to get near them .
#text=It was a mixture of locals and tourists .
#text=We decided to ride the bus to the old side of town .
#text=We got off near a strange McDonalds .
#text=Very soon after that we got back on the bus and went back into the main part of town where we felt safe .
#text=After that we just got on and off within a few mile radius of the hotel .
#text=We did end up renting a car the next day .
